name: .SMT File Extension
summary: Learn about .SMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Mobile device theme file used by various Samsung mobile phones models; includes graphics (.QMG files) for the background image, buttons, and other user interface items; also includes an XML file that defines the different screen layouts for the theme; saved in the compressed .ZIP format.

content: If you download a new SMT file to your PC, you can install it using the following procedures:
Connect your phone to the PC.
Copy the SMT file to the phone's storage card within the Themes directory.
Navigate to your phone applications and choose Settings → Display and Light → Theme.

NOTE: SMT files are created using the Samsung Theme Designer, a program that allows Samsung developers to design custom themes. Once a theme has been created, you can select the Export Theme button to create the SMT file. The button is located in the Tools Quick Access panel.
